snippet: John Terry was removed as England’s captain on Friday while awaiting trial for racial abuse, but he will remain eligible to play for the national team at the European Championships.
abstract: John Terry is removed as England’s soccer captain while awaiting trial for racial abuse, but he will remain eligible to play for the national team at the European Championships.
lead_paragraph: John Terry was removed as England’s captain on Friday while awaiting trial for racial abuse, but he will remain eligible to play for the national team at the European Championships.
